    • Uses of Resource in wobani.resources.shaders

      Classes in wobani.resources.shaders that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlinnPhongShader
      This shader can draw meshes and splines by using the Blinn-Phong shading.
      class  EnvironmentShader 
      class  Shader
      This abstract class is the base all of the shaders.
      class  ShadowShader
      This shader can render the shadow map.
      class  SkyBoxShader
      This shader can draw a skybox.
      class  SolidColorShader
      This shader can render Renderabes by drawing them with one color.
      class  TexturedQuadShader
      This shader can render an image to a quad.

    • Uses of Resource in wobani.resources.shaders.postprocessing

      Classes in wobani.resources.shaders.postprocessing that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FxaaShader
      Performs FXAA.
      class  GammaCorrectionShader
      Performs gamma correction on the image.
      class  GrayscaleShader
      Makes the image grayscaled.
      class  InvertShader
      Inverts the image's colors.
      class  ReinhardToneMappingShader
      Performs Reinhard tone mapping on the image.

      Implementation of the Catmull-Rom spline.

      This class extends SimpleSpline to it can store a cubic spline based on a 4x4 basis matrix.
      class  SimpleSpline
      Represents a simple spline.
